title: Recursive Fibonacci
run_instructions: Try changing the input to see how execution time changes.
how_it_works: Defines a recursive function that computes the Fibonacci sequence.
Demonstrates conditional branching and recursive calls in Koto.
Shows how returning the final value exposes it in the console output.

inputs.name: n
inputs.label: Sequence index
inputs.description: Provide a non-negative integer to evaluate.

tests.label: Test runner
tests.description: Details on writing unit tests for scripts.
